personalInfo.name: Parsh Jain
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
personalInfo.bio: Passionate full-stack developer and B.Tech student with Honours in Artificial Intelligence at K.J. Somaiya College of Engineering. I specialize in crafting dynamic, user-friendly web applications and integrating machine learning to solve impactful problems.

education.degree: B.Tech with Honours in Artificial Intelligence
education.description: Currently pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Engineering. Studying various subjects related to my field of interest and actively participating in extracurricular activities.
Completed my higher secondary education with a focus on science and mathematics. Developed a strong foundation in these subjects, preparing for college-level studies.

Completed my secondary education with a well-rounded curriculum including languages, sciences, and humanities. Participated in various extracurricular activities, developing interpersonal skills alongside academic achievements.

workExperience.description: Software Testing Intern focused on automation testing and UI validation for trading applications.
responsibilities: Automated test workflows for trade setup applications using Selenium
Validated branding guidelines and UI compliance across Barclays platforms using Axe Core, Lighthouse, and Percy
Collaborated with Agile teams including QA, DevOps, and Product during CI/CD pipeline deployments

workExperience.description: Developed a professional website for a non-profit organization, focusing on user engagement and donation integration.
responsibilities: Created a responsive website using React and Node.js
Integrated Razorpay for secure donation processing
Implemented event management features and testimonials section
Ensured accessibility and user-friendly navigation

workExperience.description: Worked as a Web Developer intern, gaining hands-on experience in professional web development.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained company websites
Provided technical support to clients
Implemented new features and functionality
Collaborated with senior developers on projects
Learned industry best practices and development workflows

workExperience.description: Working as a Web Developer, focusing on creating responsive and user-friendly websites for clients.
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining websites, ensuring high performance and reliability
Providing technical support and implementing updates to enhance website functionality
Creating responsive designs that work across all devices
Integrating modern web technologies and frameworks
Collaborating with clients to understand requirements and deliver solutions

volunteeringExperience.description: Committee Head, managing alumni repositories and organizing national-level events and workshops for tech enthusiasts.
responsibilities: Enhancing the management of alumni repositories to facilitate better connections and resource sharing
Organizing workshops and events that promote skill development and knowledge sharing among participants
Encouraging collaboration on open-source projects to foster a community of tech enthusiasts

volunteeringExperience.description: Web Developer Intern collaborating on enhancing the Redshift Racing India website for improved user experience and functionality.
responsibilities: Ensuring website stability and compatibility across various platforms
Conducting thorough testing, debugging, and optimization to enhance website performance
Designed and implemented the team website using React and Next.js
Integrated dynamic content management features

projects.title: Stock Broking Platform
projects.description: A dynamic web-based platform for real-time stock market visualization and trading simulations. Features live data integration, interactive financial charts, and predictive analytics powered by AI models.

projects.title: Chess Game Prediction
projects.description: An AI-driven chess prediction web app that analyzes historical moves and board positions to forecast game outcomes. Utilizes machine learning models to simulate strategies and suggest optimal plays.

projects.title: Smart Business Cost Planning
projects.description: A smart cost-planning tool tailored for small and medium enterprises (SMEs). Automates expense tracking, generates financial reports, and offers AI-based suggestions to optimize budget allocations and operational costs.

projects.title: Redshift Racing India
projects.description: A sleek, high-performance website for a collegiate racing team. Showcases event highlights, team rosters, project galleries, and real-time announcements with a mobile-first, responsive design.

projects.title: Dautyam Club Website
projects.description: Official club portal built for a college council. Offers event scheduling, photo galleries, member highlights, and a CMS-friendly admin panel for seamless content updates and announcements.

projects.title: MBP Trust NGO Website
projects.description: A professionally developed website for a non-profit organization. Includes donation integration via Razorpay, event pages, testimonials, and a responsive layout that ensures accessibility across all devices.

projects.title: Food Recipe Finder
projects.description: An intuitive recipe finder app allowing users to search meals by ingredients or keywords. Includes detailed instructions, nutritional breakdowns, and responsive UI for a delightful cooking experience.

projects.title: Kriya Dhrishti - Anomaly Detection
projects.description: A real-time anomaly detection system using computer vision and deep learning. Designed to identify irregular human activity in surveillance footage for use in smart cities and security infrastructure.

projects.title: Satya Kendra - Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Sentiment analysis platform that processes user-generated text and classifies sentiments with high accuracy. Features an interactive dashboard for data visualization and NLP model performance tracking.

projects.title: E-commerce Fashion Hub
projects.description: A full-stack ecommerce web application featuring secure user authentication, product filtering, cart management, and order processing. Built for scalability and optimized for high-performance browsing.

projects.title: Automatic Email Sender
projects.description: A utility tool that enables scheduled email delivery with dynamic content templates. Designed for marketing automation and bulk communication, with Google Apps Script and Gmail API integration.

projects.title: Expenditure Budget Tracker
projects.description: An interactive budgeting web app that helps users manage daily, weekly, and monthly expenses. Includes visual graphs, categorized spending, and data export functionality for financial planning.

projects.title: Power BI Data Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A business intelligence project using Microsoft Power BI. Offers visual dashboards, KPI tracking, and deep insights through interactive charts and slicers, making data-driven decisions seamless.

achievements.title: Smart India Hackathon Participant
achievements.description: Participated in Smart India Hackathon, developing innovative solutions for real-world problems using AI and machine learning technologies.

achievements.title: Multiple Hackathon Participations
achievements.description: Actively participated in 3+ hackathons, showcasing problem-solving skills and innovative thinking in competitive environments.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributions
achievements.description: Contributed to various open-source projects, helping improve software accessibility and functionality for the developer community.

achievements.title: Technical Competition Winner
achievements.description: Won several technical competitions at college level, demonstrating expertise in programming and problem-solving.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Create high quality website design as per required specifications and modern standards.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Write codes for the designed website integrating full features and functionality to it.

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: Analyzing and interpreting data to derive meaningful insights and make informed decisions.
